string.value: The classes in Hogwarts are not started yet. You can start one with /startgame or a chaotic year with /startchaos
{0} has started a new school year. Use / join to get on the Hogwarts Express ... and probably receive an Avada Kedavra.
A new school year has been started by {0}! Join to get haunted and killed!
{0} has started a chaotic year in Hogwarts! Join to lose yourself in the corridors and die!
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Join to lose yourself in the corridors and die!
You missed the Hogwairts Express! The year has already started.
You are in the Hogwarts Express already!
1 minute left to Join
{0} seconds left to Join
Few magicians went to Hogwarts, nothing special happened there that year. Classes are canceled!
The school year at Hogwarts is beginning, please wait while I, the Sorting Hat distributed the papers
{0} is expelled for attempting to explore forbidden parts at Hogwarts (names initiated by / are not allowed)
{0} The Sorting Hat does not recognize you, please change your name to participate in the selection.
I'm so sorry, the maximum number of magicians has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Please, send an owl for private ({1}) saying start, as it is not yet enrolled in Hogwarts. So that I can send you private owls, you must send me an owl you first.
You can not run away! YOU ARE DEAD! Come back to your body, you, playful ghost. It seems like a joke... jeez!
{0} has returned to home!
{0} remaining magicians in Hogwarts.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
It seems you have not gone to the Hogwarts Express ...
I have not been able to find a magician / witch with that name.
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to launch an Avada Kedavra to {1}.
{0} has voted to send {1} to Azkaban.
{0} has not voted for 2 nights in a row. The forces of good judged this as a thing of a tenebrous magician and then suddenly falls, dead. {1}
You traitor!!! Now you are a Death Eater! ...
Choice accepted.
\nThe Professor of Divination is... {0}.
{0} was the Professor of Divination. As Firenze, you take the cristal ball and you become the new Adivination Teacher.
{0} was Firenze, and has taken the cristal ball to fill {1}'s place as the new Professor od Divination!
You see {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to send to Azkaban?
Who do you want to follow?
Who do you want to throw a Sectusempra? {0} spell (s) remain.
Who would you like to pay a visit to the bedroom?
Who do you want to see?
Who do you want to protect?
Who do you want to throw an Avada Kedavra?
Who would you like to investigate with your Patronus?
Who is your example to follow?
Who would you like to kiss him to death and substitute for a Dementor?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are Dolores Umbrige, and you are cursed. For now you are a simple teacher of Hogwarts, but if you are tortured by the Death Eaters, you will receive the dark mark and become a Death Eater.

You are the Hermione Granger, fighter of Hogwarts. During the day, you may choose a magician to follow them through the school and know what they are However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to the Death Eaters! (40% chance)

Congrats! You are Horace Slughorn! You put potions in the wrong bottles and ended up drinking them. If the Death Eaters attack you, they will feel the effects of your potions and they will not be able to attack anyone the next night.
You are Lily Potter, the defender of Hogwarts. Each night, you may choose a magician to protect. However, if you choose a Death Eater, there is a 50% chance you will die.

You are Sirius Black. You have only two spells remaining. During the day, you may choose to throw a Sectusempra to another Magician. Everyone will hear the screams of agony and will know you are Sirius Black (not a Death Eater).

You Slut! You are Cho Chang. You are one of the most courted witches. During the night, you can choose someone to charm with the Viritaserum potion and discover if the magician is a Death Eater or not.However, if you try to charm a Death Eater, or someone who is being attacked by them, you die. If you love someone and the Death Eaters try to kill you in your bedroom, survive (since you were not there).

You are Peter Pettigrew, the great traitor! For now, you are an animagus living clandestinely like a mouse, but once all the Death Eaters are dead, you will reveal one of them. If the Divination Professor or Firenze looks at you, you may or may not be identified by them as a Death Eater.
You are a DEATH EATER! Fantastic! During the night you can choose a magician or witch to torture and kill, along with your clan, the Death Eaters.

You are the Professor of Divination, your role is to guide Hogwarts in the war against the Death Eaters. During the night, you can choose someone to see, and have their lifes revealed to you. Look with caution, because the Death Eaters are crazy to kill you!
You are a simple Wizard, condemned to spend your days studying spells waiting to be killed by the Death Eaters. Once a day you can vote for someone to send to Azkaban, use your vote wisely.
You are Severus Snape! You are your own team! If you can make them to send you to Azkaban you win automatically. Be selfish!
You are Draco Malfoy! Pick a magician to be your example of life. - if they die, or they are sent to Azkaban, hate will dominate you and you will join the Death Eaters.
You are Ron Weasley , you will know who the (real) Professor of Divination is. (and not Argus Filch)- that is your only function. Use this to help your team, Hogwarts!
You are Firenze, the apprentice Divination and a fighter of Hogwarts. If the Professor of Divination dies, you will take the cristal ball and you will be the new Professor of Divination.

You are one of the Dementors. During the night, you can choose someone to kiss till death and replace it with a Dementor. If all the remaining players at the end of the game are replaced by Dementors, they expire!

The Dementors are at Hogwarts trying to inhale all happiness and spread fear and sadness, and you, Remus Lupin, must defend the school! During the night you can use the patronus spell to investigate a Wizard. If he / she is a Dementor, he / she dies. If the dementors attack you, the weaker Dementor will die.
The night approaches and the Magicians at Hogwarts meet to decide who will go to Azkaban today ... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
Dawn at Hogwarts. You now have {0} seconds to make your accusations / defenses / discuss.
Night fell. Everyone goes to sleep quite tired after a very stressful day. Night magicians, you have {0} seconds to use your actions!
The mages and witches voted, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} was sent to Azkaban {1}
Unable to reach a final decision on who to send to Azkaban, the restless magicians return to their bedrooms, frustrated ...
Something stinks, nobody voted! No one will be sent to Azkaban today ...
Students and teachers meet in the morning, but no one can find {0} among them. They run to her bedroom and find skinned, with a wand in their throat. {0} was Hermione Granger!
The morning arrives and, to everyone's surprise, impaled on the top of the Astronomy tower was the body of {0}, Lilian J. Potter, lifeless.

All leave their rooms and then find a wand split in the middle ... then legs ... then fingers ... and floating in the lake of Hogwarts, the body of {0}, killed by the Death Eaters. They have killed Sirius Black.

Students and teachers wake up with the news of {0} dead on top of a shell table, tarot cards scattered on the floor and the crystal ball lying in a corner of the room. The Divination Professor is dead.
Everyone awakes with a strong smell of burning wood ... Horace Slughorn's office is burning! After extinguishing the fire, the remains of {0} are found, toasted and emaciated ...
As the sun rises over Hogwarts, students find {0} lying on top of a used table, WITH A SNOW SPHERE AND POKEMON LETTERS ???? HAHAHAHAHA THAT FOOLISH. {0} was the Argus Filch
As everyone gets up to do their daily tasks, they feel a horrible smell. They follow the smell to find {0} quartered in the forest, killed by a terrible forbidden spell. AVADA KEDAVRA.

The bedroom of {0} is quite cold ... Students and teachers then decide to enter there and feel a void, as if there was no more happiness in the world ... Making it clear that Remus Lupine conjured his Patronus, filling the place of light and sending the Dementor back to Azkaban!
Students and teachers join the main hall during the morning and breathe a sigh of relief - there seems to have been no attack last night.
You were attacked by the Death Eaters. For being cursed, you have become a Death Eater!
Your Death Eater partner (s) are: {0}
{0} has been attacked ... but she was Dolores Umbridge and she became a Death Eater! Congratulations for your new partner!
Oh no! The Death Eaters threw you the forbidden spell AVADA KEDAVRA!
Oh no! {0} was a drunk! Now you are drunk, and can't attack tomorrow night...
You tried to protect a Death Eater! The Death Eater gave you an Avada Kedavra!
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you did not do anything very useful. This time.
You went to protect {0}, but they were not in their bedroom!
Lily J. Potter was taking care of you last night and scared the Death Eaters! What a bless!
Cho Chang chose a lousy day to rest and stay in the bedroom. {0} She was attacked by the Death Eaters!
Strange ... {0} was not in the bedroom! There's no kill for you today ...
You went in the bedroom of {0} to kiss a little and discover some truths, but discovered too late that he was a Death Eater. You are dead.
{0} went to the wrong bedroom last night! With a bottle of Veritaserum in his pocket, {0} was found ruthlessly nailed to the door of the Main Hall ... how sad :(
{0} went to sleep at the house of {1}, ready to have some fun and discover truths. However, she found a Death Eater killing {1}! The Death Eater quickly turns to {0} and ... {0} is dead too.
You perceive that {0} is not a Death Eater, since your kisses convinced him to drink the potion and reveal the truth!

In the middle of the night a Witch enters her bedroom and gives you something to drink in exchange for a kiss. You were very sleepy to recognize, but your voice was so sweet that you could not refuse to answer some questions. So, after the kiss, the witch goes back to where it came from.
You have noticed {0} snooping around! {0} is Hermione Granger, the detective!
Your research proved that {0} is {1}
It seems that {0} did not like being visited by Cho Chang! Sirius Black went crazy and took revenge. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a spell is triggered. The students looked to see {0} standing on the body of {1}, with the wand still pointed towards the head. {2}.
The Death Eater has won!
The Death Eaters have won!
The magicians won! All the Death Eaters died ...
Oh no! You have sent Severus Snape to Azkaban! He has won the game.
Remaining players, roles and faction:
{0} has voted to kiss the death and replace {1} with a dementor.
{0} was sent to kiss the death and replace {1} for a Dementor ... However, he was Remus Lupin, and had a great way to ward off the Dementors! He returned to Azkaban.
{0} went to your office last night, ready to kiss the death and replace you ... But you had a great way to protect yourself. One of the Dementors returned to Azkaban ... {1} remaining (s)!
You received the kiss of the death of a Dementor and was replaced by one of them. During the night, you can try to kiss them to death and replace other magicians ...
Dementors: {0}
{0} He received the kiss of death and was replaced by a Dementor!
{0} was sent to kiss the death and replace {1} ... But no one was in the bedroom.
All the Magicians died and the only survivors are the Dementors ... The Dementors won!
You went to investigate {0}, but when you got there you found only the feelings of sadness and loneliness!
You invade the {0} room and feel an air of sadness and depression instead. You know very well what to do on these occasions: invoke the Patronus enchantment.
You enter the bedroom of {0} but do not feel empty and unhappy. {0} is not part of the Dementors ... Still ...
The amazing life example of {0} has just died. In rage, he has become a Death Eater!
{0} was killed! In a fit of rage, you become a Death Eater! Your new partners are: {1}
a Magician 👱
Horace Slughorn 🍻
Cho Chang💋
The Professor of Divination 👳

Dumbledore's army 👷

You are a member of the Dumbledore Army, a secret society of Magicians who came together to help Hogwarts against Death Eater attacks. If there are others from the Army, you will know his name. Otherwise, you will be a simple magician.

As everyone gets up during the morning, {0} 's body is near the Room of Requirements, with his wand on his chest, broken in the middle and a notebook with some spells. One of the members of the Army has died.
Dumbledore's Army is formed by: {0}

The most recent member of the Dementors runs to the room of {0} to give the kiss of the death and to replace them by a Dementor, but it finds instead disorder, a lot of blood and pieces ... The objective has been assassinated!

The Death Eaters go to the quarter of {0}, for the attack, but there they are with a high creature, elevated and surrounded by light, armed with a sword and a wand. Lily Potter comes out in defense of the target and, after a fight full of light effects, they return to their bedrooms defeated.
{0} has been sent to give the coup de grace and replace {1} for a Dementor, but their Patronus was too strong. :(
{1} a wizard / witch with the name {0} has already joined the battle. Please change your name to enter Hogwarts.

You went to the bedroom of {0} to kiss a little, but when you arrived you felt a feeling of emptiness, as if your soul left your body. On the return to the Room of Requirements you decide to eat a chocolate toad ...
was
As they all get up and leave their rooms during the morning, they sense the absence of {0} ... When they check their bedroom, they find their body lifeless.
As the villagers gather as the sun rises, the find the remains of {0}, who died somehow last night...
How strange ... {0} did not appear in the Room of Requirement this morning...
You try to escape, but you should know that this is not possible at Hogwarts. With the Death Eaters here, the exits are closed so NO ONE can run! Good luck with that!
is dead
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @greywolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is not a school year at Hogwarts at the moment. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a Director can use this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
ID of the student or teacher was not found. Make sure you have sent the command as an answer.
{0} is already a Director!
{0} is not a Director!
{0} removed from Directors list.
Language set to {0}
The Divination Professor is not in Hogwarts!
Time's up!

You are Luna Lovegood. Sent to Hogwarts with your spectrespecs glasses and the love potion of Amortentia. The first day you can chose two magicians to be loved for the entire school year. If one of them die, the other will die of sorrow. After joining two pigeons, you can go back to following your life as a simple Wizard.
You are Nymphadora Tonks. A metamorphmagus, capable of modifying its own appearance without the use of spells or potions. Choose a magician and when he dies you assume the role of him at Hogwarts.

You are Harry Potter! Your wand is your lover and you are with her all the time, you even sleeps with her. If you die, you can choose a magician to kill. And if the Death Eaters visit you at night, you are not someone who would accept to die without a fight, but in the darkness, you can not choose who to kill.
You are Gellert Grindelwald. You are alone and the other magicians are nothing but your toys. Each night you can choose a player to launch an Avada Kedavra and add to your body collection.

Love is in the air!! You were bewitched The face of {0} does not leave your head. Your goal now is the survival of the two. If one of you is killed or sent to Azkaban, the other will accompany you, so that you can be together.
Cupid's arrow has struck you! You are madly in love with {0}! If they die, you will die too. If one of you two wins, you will both win.
Hogwarts decided to send you to Azkaban! It's your last chance to use your beloved wand!
{0} tries to reach his wand while he is judged, but his fingers are tired and before reaching it, he is sent to Azkabán ...
{0} pulls out his wand, and points to the crowd ... His shooter's eyes try to decide who he will take with him. But he accepts his end, alone ...
Upon arrival in Azkaban, {0} pulls out his wand and, Quick as a cobra, casts a spell on {1}! EXPELIARMUS...; says Harry Potter to {1}, he / she {2}, who falls lifeless on the ground.
You were mortally wounded! With your last breath, you can take a magician with you ... Choose fast!
{0} received a deep wound, so much that he could not even get his wand out, falling dead on the floor ...
{0}, as if the blood coming out of his belly was nothing, he decides not to give his last spell, accepting his destiny ...
{0} falls to the ground, mortally wounded ... But before dying, he pulls out his wand and gives it a precise spell on {1}, falling hard on the ground, with a mark on his forehead. {2}
AAAAH! AAAH! Hogwarts hears sounds of agony at night! The Death Eaters attacked the wrong person, Harry Potter did not leave alone, he took a Death Eater {0}, next to him.
The Death Eater tried to attack the wrong person last night! Harry Potter knows how to protect himself very well and left a small gift to Hogwarts, the body of {0}!

The Death Eaters tried to attack the wrong person last night! {0} is without his clothes hanging on the wall, You can almost feel sorry for that Death Eater! Gellert Grindelwald won a new body for his collection.

It seems like a normal night, but where is {0}? Students gather in {0} 's room, and find their bodies in the bathtub full of blood with their bodies floating ... Gellert Grindelwald has had fun tonight ... {1}
You went to have a little fun with {0}. But getting there, Lily J. Potter ended your fun! No jokes that night ...
The Dementors command {0} to kiss till death and replace {1} with a Dementor. Arriving there {0} you are greeted with an Avada Kedavra well in the chest! {0} is dead...

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a knife!!! {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead D:
You tried to protect the wrong magician. Gellert Grindelwald invites you to be the guinea pig of a terrible experiment. The kind of experiment that you die in the end ...

You visited the bedroom of {0} to have a little fun. But that night only {0} is going to have fun with you, while he was throwing a Crucio on his body. You died, but if it's any consolation, you seemed to have a lot of fun tonight ...
{0} visited the wrong bedroom, what was to be a night of kisses and fun turned into a terrifying night, Gellert Grindelwald had a lot of fun tonight.
{0}, Nymphadora Tonks, now he has become a member of Dumbledore's Army, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a mason. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
{0}, Nymphadora Tonks was replaced by a Dementor.
{0} dead, accepting your fate, you joined the dementors. Your new partners (if any) are: {1}
Nymphadora Tonks {0} became a Death Eater, one more for the clan!
{0} has died, and you transform into a Death Eater! Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only survivor was Gellert Grindelwald! He has had a lot of fun with this joke, because there is no better fun to overcome, especially when that means killing all of you!
Who do you want to kill tonight?

{0} gives his last breath, looking into the back of his beloved's eyes, {1} who holds his body on his knees. {1} can not stand the pain, and with a wand throws an Avada Kedavra to himself... They will be together even in the world of the dead. {2}
Who do you want to become if they die?
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the second player
Harry Potter🎯
Luna Lovegood🏹
Gellert Grindelwald🔪
Nymphadora Tonks🎭
You have become the Draco Malfoy. Your awesome life example is: {0}.
True love endures! That's what you wanted, right? Love always win!
When they wake up, they find {0} dead in the middle of the Great Hall, totally emaciated due to the Sectumsempra. It seems that someone visited Harry Potter and it went wrong! {1}
In the middle of the night you feel a sadness, a void, as if your happiness was unburdening. You use your patronus, and you are protected.
You are already on the wait list for {0}.
Your application for the Hogwarts school was sent. We will let you know when a new school year begins!
A new year at Hogwarts is starting in {0}.

The morning arrives at Hogwarts and only two magicians stayed at the school. {0} looks at {1}, a sinister smile on his face, he removes his wand and throws a Crucio, playing with {1}, until he decides to use the third unforgivable curse on {1}, which is now dead.
Everyone at Hogwarts died ... No one won that Battle ... Unless, perhaps, the vultures.

The sun rises on the horizon, {0} and {1} are the only survivors. {0} approaches smiling at {1}, and invites him to a joke. {1} Fast as thunder pulls out his wand and casts a deadly spell on {0}. {0}, with his last breath, use an Avada Kedavra in {1}. They both died, the day is over and there was no winner to tell the story ...
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen your awesome life example for you: {0}
Won
Lost
The magician {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.

You are a simple magician, condemned to spend his days studying / teaching at Hogwarts waiting to be killed by the Death Eaters, his enemies. Once a day you can vote for someone to send to Azkaban, use your vote wisely.

You are the Professor of Divination, the Clairvoyant, your role is to guide Hogwarts in the crusade against the Death Eaters. During the night, you can choose someone to see, and have their lives revealed to you. Use your power with caution, because the Death Eaters are crazy to kill you!
YOU ARE A DEATH EATER!! Great! During the night you can choose a magician to torture and kill, along with your clan, the Death Eaters.

You slut...You are Cho Chang, one of the most courted witches of Hogwarts. During the night, you can choose someone to enchant with the Viritaserum potion and discover if the magician is a Death Eater or not. However, if you try to charm a Death Eater, or someone who is being attacked by them, you die. If you love someone and the Death Eaters try to kill you in your bedroom, survive (since you were not there).

You drunken bastard! Congratulations, you're Horace Slughorn! You put potions in the wrong bottles and ended up drinking them. If the Death Eaters attack you, they will feel the effects of your potions and they will not be able to attack anyone the next night.
You are Dolores Umbrige, you have been cursed. For now you are a simple teacher of Hogwarts, but if you are tortured by the Death Eaters, you will receive the dark mark and become a Death Eater.

You are Peter Pettigrew, the great traitor! For now, you are an animagus living clandestinely like a mouse, but once all the Death Eaters are dead, you will reveal one of them. If the Divination Professor or Firenze looks at you, you may or may not be identified by them as a Death Eater.

You are Lily J. Potter, and your role is to protect Hogwarts. During the night, you can choose a magician to protect, even if it means losing your life. However, if you protect a Death Eater, you may have a fate worse than death.

You are Hermione Granger, and fight for Hogwarts. During the day, you can choose a Wizard to follow him and discover what they are. However, by doing this, you can be discovered by the Death Eaters! (40%)

You are Sirius Black. You have 2 spells to help Hogwarts. During the day, you can throw a Sectumsempra to someone. Everyone will hear the cries of agony from the victim and they will know you are Sirius Black.
You are Severus Snape, your team is you! If you go to Azkaban, you win automatically, alone. Be selfish!
Argus Filch says he is a magician ... When he casts a spell, nothing happens.

You are one of the Dementors. During the night, you can choose someone to kiss the death and replace it with a Dementor. If all the remaining players at the end of the game are replaced by Dementors, they expire!

The Dementors are at Hogwarts trying to inhale all happiness and spread fear and sadness, and you, Remus Lupine, must defend the school! During the night you can use the patronus spell to investigate a Wizard. If he (it) is a Dementor, he / she dies. If the dementors attack you, the weaker Dementor will die.
You are Draco Malfoy! Choose someone to be your awesome life example - if he / she dies or is sent to Azkaban, hatred will dominate you and you will join the Death Eaters.
You are Firenze, the Apprentice of Divination, and fight for Hogwarts. If the divination teacher dies, he will take his place as Professor.
You are Ron Weasley, you will know who is the true Professor of Divination (and not the Argus Filch). Use this to help your team, Hogwarts!

You are a member of the Dumbledore Army, a secret society of Magicians who came together to help Hogwarts against Death Eater attacks. If there are others from the Army, you will know his name. Otherwise, you will be a simple magician.
You are Nymphadora Tonks, a , capable of modifying your own appearance without the use of spells or potions. Choose a magician and when he dies you assume the role of him at Hogwarts.

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.

You are the Mayor. Your vote during the lynching will count twice, once you have revealed yourself. You are on the village team.
You are secretly the Prince, escaping from your boring, pampered life by spending the day with these peasants. If they try to lynch you, they realize their error, and no one will be lynched.
You are the Clumsy Guy: You’ll try to vote, but there is a 50% chance you’ll vote for someone else other than you intended instead. You’re still on the village team though.

You are the Sorcerer, allying yourself with creatures of the night rather than villagers. At night you will use your power to find the wolves or the Seer. You win only if the wolves win. Enjoy helping snuff out those miserable villagers.

You are the Blacksmith: the metalworker of the village. You have a small amount of silver, enough to prevent the wolves from attacking for one night. During the day, you can choose to powder it and spread it around the village. Other than that, you are just a villager.

You are the Alpha Wolf; the source of the scourge. Your bite is the cause of the curse that turns humans into werewolves. Each night, you will choose a human to attack and kill, but as long as you are alive, your victim has a 20% chance of turning into a werewolf.

You are the Wolf Cub; adored by your wolf pack. Like other wolves, you will choose a villager to attack and kill every night. If you happen to be killed, your wolf pack will fly into a rage and attack two people the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

As the village begins to lynch {0}, they say “Wait! I am the Prince. This royal ring, with the seal of the king proves it. Every night I am surrounded by servants. So I cannot be evil.” Feeling foolish, the villagers sheepishly retire for the night.
You try to look at {0}, but can't quite make out what they are. They are not a wolf or seer however...
{0} steps forward and presents the official seal of the Mayor, declaring themselves as such. From now on, {0}'s votes for lynching will count twice.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as the Mayor.
Reveal
Would you like to spread the silver today, disabling the wolves tonight?

As the rest of the village debates over the events, they suddenly notice {0} wandering around spreading silver across the grounds. For now, at least, the village will be safe from wolf attacks. (Wolves are disabled tonight.)
the Mayor 🎖
the Prince 👑
the Sorcerer 🔮
the Clumsy Guy 🤕
the Blacksmith ⚒
the Alpha Wolf ⚡️
the Wolf Cub 🐶

As the wolves attack {0}, {1} stops everyone, being the Alpha Wolf. {1} tells the pack that {0} should join the pack instead of dying, so the pack leaves them to their infection. They will become a werewolf tomorrow night.
You were attacked by the wolves, but the Alpha Wolf chose you. Instead of being killed, you have been infected... and will become a wolf tomorrow night!
As night falls, you feel a strange tingling, and your body aches as it begins to transform... You are now a werewolf!

As mayor, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* 🤔
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, I'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-

The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0}'s Head comes flying out of the Window... Wonder why they thought it was inedible! {0} is dead...

{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready for a night of passion, only to find a mysterious stranger surgically removing {1}'s innards! The serial killer decides to satisfy {0} before adding a slutty heart to their collection!
The villagers awake to find {0} hunched over a second-hand Ouija board while practising fortune-telling, with head missing. The Apprentice Seer is dead.

Seems like {0}, the resident blacksmith, must have been extremely unlucky. Five knives, fresh from {0}'s armory, were found plunged into his hands, feet and head, and pinned to the craftsman's table last night. Maybe the serial killer was hoping to expand his weapon collection alongside his organ one...
{0} was found stabbed to death with a candlestick by their altar. The serial killer has struck again, regardless of race, language or religion! {0} was a Cultist.
The next morning, the villagers were heartbroken to find {0} a.k.a. Cupid split from head to toe. Strangely the heart was missing...

The villagers had hoped to meet {0} to compliment his Martell, but all they found in {0}'s home was a broken knife and liver. All those years of drinking led to a liver so hard that even the Serial Killer probably does not fancy it...
{0} would normally have managed to fight off the serial killer, but it was an irony that the Guardian Angel's halo has extinguished. {0} is dead.

Looks like {0} was caught napping last night! A gunshot was heard last night, but all there was was the remains of a gunner, with a bullet hole to the head and a stab to the torso. Clearly the serial killer has won.

Assassination! {0} the mayor was found pinned with a knife on the table while working overnight at the mayor office! Clearly it's the serial killer exacting revenge for the asylum robbing him of years of his life!

Bells ring across the village before the sunrise, as armed guards flood the streets investigating the disappearance of Prince {0}. No clues were discovered, but it is suspected that there is a Serial Killer on the loose...

{0}'s guards were caught napping last night. The royal remains of {0} were found, hung in various parts of the palace, having fallen prey to the knife. No amount of princely blood would deter a serial killer's blade.

The villagers wake up to a rotting corpse of {0}, split from head to toe, stabs all over. Strangely the brain was carefully extricated, as if it was a premonition that the village has lost their top brains. {0} was the Seer.
The sound of mournful howls can be heard across the village. A mistake has been made. The wolves have killed one of their own. The Sorcerer {0} is dead.
Cries of "I'm your ally!" were heard last night. All the villagers found next morning were an exhumed body and smashed mystical ball, belonging to {0}, the sorcerer. Hunger trumps comradeship...

NOMNOMNOMNOM! The wolves were heard last night, eating up a tender Wild Child, {0}, leaving behind only a reduced-size skeleton! The village wondered if the wolves felt any guilt tearing apart the defenceless child.

The villagers wake up in the morning, only to find the severed body parts of {0}, the Cultist Hunter, in a cart placed in full view outside the town hall. Lesson learnt: don't visit the serial killer!
The body of {0}, the Cultist Hunter, was found in the middle of town, albeit cut precisely into a hundred pieces. Checking if the Serial Killer was a cultist does not seem to be a good idea...

While it seemed that the wolves decided to stay good for once, punishing {0}, a cultist that decided to court trouble with the wolves, proved too difficult to resist. {0}'s head was converted to a fine supper, delivered to the wolves' doorsteps!

The cult ran into unexpected trouble last night. Their newest member had the misfortune of visiting a wolf on the night the wolves decided to stay home, and the wolf found {0} quite delicious. Unfortunately for {0}, wolves have no interest in joining the new religious movement.

The cult thought they would have a new member in their ranks, but they were wrong! {0}, a cultist, was minced to pieces and placed at the town square in the morning! Strangely their "holy" book was found stabbed with a knife, as if a statement to show whose religion was triumphant.

Last night, the cult tried to convert the one person in the village crazier than they are. Their newest member tried to convert the Serial Killer, and the Serial Killer made a new piece of art in the town square of {0}'s internal organs.

It was supposed to be a night where {0} would save the village from the killers, but {0}'s halo was extinguished and wings sliced by the serial killer! Left was a note, "I could protect myself better than you can."
{0} tried to guard a wolf last night. The town woke up to find only the wings of {0} hung on the church cross. Clearly the wolves had an extra meal god-sent, free-of-charge, to their homes.

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} tries to eat {0} up, but {0}'s military training and paranoia proves too much to handle! All there is left is a carcass with two shots to the torso and the last man standing: the victorious hunter for the village!

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} chose a time where {0}'s guard was at their lowest. Eliminating the final villager proved to be effortless for {1}, for all there remains is a mutiliated body of {0}, the hunter, adorned with parallel slashes to the face.

{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. Seeing a shimmering cross worn around {0}'s neck, the righteous {1} draws their sword for the final time, putting an end to the twisted learnings of the cult that have contaminated the village.

As the sun starts to shine on the village, {0} wakes to the sound of silence. Realising there was no one left, {0} walks and walks, until they stand alone in the middle of the village. Looking at the sight of the corpses strewn all across the village, {0} sighs. Their lifelong dream of being chosen to be lynched by the villagers is as dead as the villagers are. They reach out and touch the rope, that had taken many lives, tenderly, before slipping it around their neck and letting themselves hang freely, with a sad smile on their face.

{0} wakes up at dawn, alone. {0} sees how abject a failure they has been, not being able to get the village to satisfy their masochistic desires of being lynched to death. {0} grabs a rope and hangs himself, realising no one can accomplish their dream, since there is no one left.

{0} opens their eyes, but instead of hearing the usual bustle of the village, they are met with silence. They stare at the dreary ceiling, letting reality slowly sink in. Everyone was dead. The wolves were dead. With a pang in their heart, {0} gets up, and packs their things, before walking to the edge of the village. A tear slips from their eye, as {0} recalls how close they and their wolves were to victory. Alas, it was time to start a new life, with a new pack. {0} slips into the darkness of the forest, away from the quiet village.

For all of {0}'s efforts, {0}'s wolf friends lay motionless and lifeless. Even if the wolves have been brought victory, there is no one to savour the success with, neither are there any living villagers to mock at. {0} peers into the crystal ball, and silently disappears, in a cloud of fog, in search of new wolves, new allies, and new treachery to commit new crimes against humanity.
